title: Rocks In Motion Pack 1
description: Foleys: Debris, Stones, Rocks, & Pebbles For Game Sound Design
longDescription:
Listen to the watermarked demo of some of the sounds:

CLICK HERE


ROCKS IN MOTION PACK 1: Experience the visceral sensation of the earth’s power with this foley SFX pack. This comprehensive sound design foley pack contains over 110 high-fidelity sound files, each meticulously recorded to capture the essence of geological movement and tension. From the subtle shifting of pebbles to the thunderous rumble of an earthquake, this pack offers a wide range of audio that emulates the sounds of moving rocks, stones, and debris.


Perfect for sound designers seeking to create immersive environments for epic, adventurous, and action-packed games, 'ROCKS IN MOTION PACK 1' provides the audio tools needed to convey the intensity of natural disasters, the aftermath of destruction, and the unique texture of vehicles traversing gravelly terrains. The pack includes sounds with lengths varying from less than a second to a full 26 seconds, allowing for both quick bursts of sound and more drawn-out, dynamic movements.


Whether you’re depicting the collapse of a building, the aftermath of a quake, or the steady advance of a convoy over rough terrain, this pack offers the authenticity and variety to bring your game’s sound design to life. Feel the ground slip beneath your feet and let the raw energy of the earth enhance your audio narrative.
technicalDetails:
Features: 


Breakdown of total 172 foleys:-


Crackling Small Pebbles - 36 SFX

Gritty Gravel - 11 SFX

Passing Over Small Pebbles - 10 SFX

Rock Slides - 26 SFX

Rocks Clattering - 18 SFX

Rumbling Debris - 37 SFX

Stones Clatter - 10 sfx

Slab Friction - 12 SFX

Stones Gravel - 12 SFX



Number of Audio Waves: 172

Number of Audio Cues: 172

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 KHz 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 13:47

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
